bibl.title: The Roman Near East: The View from Below.

series.title: Culture and History of the Ancient Near East.

bibl.title: Semitic Papyrology in Context. A Climate of Creativity. Papers from a New York University Conference Marking the Retirement of Baruch A. Levine
bibl.author: PETERS, Frank E.

bibl.note: Utilise le témoignage des P. Nessana, en part. au sujet des pèlerinages au Mont Sinaï.
bibl.seg: PETERS Frank E., The Roman Near East: The View from Below.

Lawrence H. SCHIFFMAN (Ed.), Semitic Papyrology in Context. A Climate of Creativity. Papers from a New York University Conference Marking the Retirement of Baruch A. Levine = Culture and History of the Ancient Near East. 14 (Leiden, 2003) pp. 187-199.
